entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
